channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Sunken manhole, 6th April
item.description:
Manhole has sunk into Road effectively creating large pothole.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Saint George's Square, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hole at flood drain, 5th April
item.description:
Hole forming at flood drain

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Septic tank, 4th April
item.description:
Septic tank of Oak Cottage is outgrowing into roadside verge. Verge is very soft and vehicles have become stuck
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Bekstone Farm Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tyres dumped, 4th April
item.description:
In the ditch on the Winchcombe side of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Bothy Rushley Lane, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The public highway has been obstructed., 3rd April
item.description:
The public highway (class 5 road - USRN 40102240) has been obstructed with a locked field gate at Greenfields Farm. The gate has been reinforced with barbed wire and an historical equestrian gate located next to it also appears to have been removed, obstructing all public use.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown vegetation, 3rd April
item.description:
Obscured vision on the bridge coming out of kate lane turning left onto Southam lane. Hedgerow needs cutting back turning right onto Southam lane also.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Nest Southam Lane, Southam
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on Horsefair Street, 2nd April
item.description:
Deep pothole that is getting worse

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 53 Horsefair Street, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked PROW, 2nd April
item.description:
Gloucestershire Way footpath blocked with a locked and barb-wired gate. Signs erected saying permissive paths closed. Footpath is not a permissive footpath.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Morrisons to the pinch point in Caernarvon Road, 2nd April
item.description:
The potholes in the road from Morrisons, past Salisbury Avenue, to the pinch point in Caernarvon Road is littered with potholes which makes driving dangerous as cars slow down to avoid them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 70 Canterbury Walk, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin needs emptying, 1st April

item.title: Congestion, 1st April
item.description:
Traffic at a stand still, drivers swearing at each other, cars mounting pavements, engines running whilst infant and junior school children walk by.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 54 Robert Burns Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement blocked, 1st April
item.description:
Pavement is inaccessible to pedestrians, making them walk into the road just by a busy crossroads.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 82 Milton Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Blocked ditch opposite Number 38 Greenway Lane Charlton Kings Cheltenham, 31st March
item.description:
The ditch that runs alone side Greenway Lane Charlton Kings Cheltenham is becomming blocked and overgrown as this area has been a problem flooding are in the past please can someone look into having it cleared i case of further flooding
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 36 Greenway Lane, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 street lights not working, 30th March
